body_html: @guschmue I think the standard workaround for this would be to create tensorflow/core/platform/windows/cpu_info.h, tensorflow/core/platform/posix/cpu_info.h, etc. and have tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_info.h include the appropriate header based on what PLATFORM_* macro was defined. Is there a subtlety I'm missing here?
